name: Khajiit Name Generator
description: Struggling to find the purr-fect name for your Khajiit character? Look no further! Our Khajiit Name Generator crafts authentic-sounding names straight from Elsweyr. No moon sugar required (but highly encouraged for inspiration!).
introduction: J'zargo is busy experimenting, M'aiq is being mysterious... and you need a Khajiit name, *now*! Whether you're roleplaying a cunning thief, a wise mage, or a fearsome warrior, a great name is the first step. Our generator blends traditional Khajiit naming conventions with a touch of creative flair to give you a name that's both lore-friendly and unique. May your wares be plentiful, and your enemies few!
howToUse: Simply click the 'Generate' button. It's easier than picking a lock!
Keep clicking until you find a name that resonates with your Khajiit's spirit. Don't settle for anything less than purr-fection!
Feeling adventurous? Tweak the prefixes and suffixes to create a truly custom name. Just don't blame us if you accidentally invent a new Khajiit dialect!
Copy your chosen name and unleash your Khajiit upon the world! May your adventures be legendary!

faqs.question: Are these names lore-accurate?
faqs.answer: We've done our best to adhere to established Khajiit naming conventions. However, lore is always open to interpretation, so feel free to get creative!

faqs.question: Can I use these names for characters in other games?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! While inspired by the Elder Scrolls, these names can be adapted for any fantasy setting where you need a touch of feline mystique.

faqs.question: How are the names generated?
faqs.answer: Our generator combines a database of common Khajiit prefixes and suffixes with a dash of randomness. It's like alchemy, but with names!

faqs.question: Will I find the *perfect* name on the first try?
faqs.answer: Maybe! But half the fun is exploring the possibilities. Keep experimenting, and you're bound to find a name that feels just right.

faqs.question: Is this generator powered by moon sugar?
faqs.answer: While we appreciate the suggestion, no. It's powered by coffee, code, and a deep love for all things Khajiit.

faqs.question: Can I suggest new prefixes or suffixes?
faqs.answer: Yes, please! We're always looking to improve the generator. Send your suggestions our way!
